Bink SDK 1.7b

VOID_PTR

The basic type VOID_PTR describes a standard C/C++ untyped memory pointer.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: BinkCopyToBuffer, BinkCopyToBufferRect, BinkGetTrackData, BinkLogoAddress, BinkSetIO, BinkSetSoundSystem, BinkSoundUseMiles, RADARAMALLOC, RADARAMFREE, RADMEMALLOC, RADMEMFREE, RAD_IOPStartUp
Related Structures: BINKBUFFER, RAD_IOP_ASYNC_READ_DATA, RAD_IOP_SOUND_DATA
